slide.title: Checking for errors
slide.blurb: So far, we have always checked whether inserts worked.

div.example:
<?php
$m = new MongoClient;
$c = $m->demo->talks;

try {
	$c->insert( array( '_id' => 'derickr' ) );
	$c->insert( array( '_id' => 'derickr' ) );
} catch ( Exception $e ) {
    echo $e->getMessage(), "\n";
}
?>
